subject: RE: [junit] Need Help on how to write test cases for the methods that does in sert update and delete operation to Database
msgSnippet: Hi Ghanshyam , In Database accessor methods, dont test JDBC API. Hence use mockObject http://.mockobjects.com  . I have been using
messageBody:
Hi Ghanshyam ,

In Database accessor methods, dont test JDBC API. Hence use mockObject http://.mockobjects.com <http://www.mockobjects.com> . I have been using mock api for quite some time and it works great.

Shailesh

-----Original Message-----
From: Patil, Ghanshyam [mailto:gpatil@...]
Sent: Tue 3/4/2003 4:13 AM
